mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kb_card(id,summary, content, order_number, reporter, procedure_id) VALUES (#{card.id},#{card.summary}, #{card.content}, (SELECT max_order_number from (SELECT CASE WHEN max(order_number) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE max(order_number)+1 end as max_order_number FROM kb_card WHERE procedure_id=#{card.procedureId} ) as t ), #{userName}, #{card.procedureId})
mapper.update: UPDATE kb_card SET summary = #{card.summary}, content = #{card.content}, order_number = #{card.orderNumber}, reporter = #{card.reporter}, procedure_id = #{card.procedureId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kb_card WHERE procedure_id= #{procedure_id} AND delete_status=0 ORDER BY order_number
mapper.delete: UPDATE kb_card SET delete_status=1 WHERE id=#{id}
